channel.title: Outreachy on Kimberly the Geek
channel.description: Recent content in Outreachy on Kimberly the Geek

item.title: Mozilla Internship: Translate Java to Python, Pt. 2
item.description: Continued from Part 1 While I began writing my package as a direct, one-to-one translation of the Java package, my package turned out to look very different. Java and Python are, after all, very different languages. I found some methods to be unnecessary in python, and chose to not use the same design pattern as axe-selenium-java. The Java package, written by Deque Labs, uses the Builder design pattern. I wrote the methods used by the Builder class to be methods of the Axe class instead.
